Content:: 2001 (MMI) was a common year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar, the 2001st year of the Common Era (CE) and Anno Domini (AD) designations, the 1st year of the 3rd millennium and the 21st century, and the 2nd year of the 2000s decade. The year 2001 is notable for the September 11th attacks on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon in the United States. 2001 was designated as International Year of Volunteers.[1]
